name: The Quest - A Game Designed Around You
blurb: A new online adventure game created by YOU. Make alliances, trade with friends, wreak havoc and unlock 10,000 years of secrets.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Hey! We want everyone to be involved, so for $1 we list your name (or pseudonym) in the Hall of Champions within the game and send you a certificate of thanks. Imagine your name embedded directly into a game! We will EVEN give you our widest smile AND welcome you to our developers briefings where you can give your feedback and help shape this game.

Everything in the $1 reward PLUS we will name an asset in the game after you. It might be a flower or a rock or maybe even a door knob. We can use your real name or a pseudonym and we will even send you a certificate showing what you named in the game.

Everything in the $20 reward PLUS when you start playing the game we will give you a special Quest Shaper (one of our wildcards) with a special power designed exclusively for Kickstarter members. This won\u2019t affect the game balance but it will give you a positive experience.

Everything in the $40 reward PLUS we give you the rank of Apprentice with a purse of 20,000 Qetoos which will really help you in the game. We will also send you an exclusive \u201cI\u2019m in The Quest\u201d T-shirt. Hey it will be true too \u2013 you really will be in the game!  Free shipping on all orders too!
Everything in the $70 reward plus a signed CD of the original music designed for The Quest by Vlado Hudec.

Everything in the $95 reward plus a 100-page, full color, landscape book showing concept art, storyboards, doodles, behind the scenes stuff, interviews with the leading people designing the game and lots of other cool things. We will even list your name (or pseudonym) inside the book! Free shipping on all orders too!

Everything in the incredible $140 reward level PLUS a personalized MP3 thank you voiced by the legendary Jon Mohr (the guy who does our voiceover). We will send you this personalized thank you any time from October 2012.

We embed your business name into the store names of Merchantopia giving you in-game brand awareness. Players can click on your name and read about your contribution to THE QUEST and your business too. With a link to your website. Oh and we give you everything in the $180 reward level too.  Want something more? See the $280 Reward :)

Everything in the $180 reward plus you get to inspire the design of a Vault key. There are 560 keys (80 for each kingdom) and guess what? You design the key, so you own the key. You can either choose to have the key already in your inventory OR you can receive a bonus Qetoo every time someone finds your key.

Since you\u2019ve read down this far, we should be giving you something really special. So naturally we give you everything from the $180 reward PLUS we will invite you to help design a Quest Shaper, decide its special power AND we will also name it after you! Every time someone uses your Quest Shaper we will add a Qetoo to your balance and (if you want) allow those players to link to your profile.

Everything in the $195 reward level with a key enhancement. Your in-game store will become the answer to a puzzle, required by 1000 players. This drives players to become aware of your business. Want more traffic? See our $350 reward....

Everything from the $250 reward with the book (see the $140 reward) being signed by as many people involved in developing the game as possible. Naturally we will also personalize the book \u2013 making it exclusive to you.  We also upgrade you to the rank of Adventurer and give you a purse of 60,000 Qetoos.

Everything in the $280 reward level with a key enhancement. Your in-game store will become the answer to a puzzle, required by 3000 players. This drives players to become aware of your business. Want more traffic? See our $450 reward....

Everything in the $300 reward except the flower or door knob naming from the $20 level. Instead let\u2019s go for something really big like a bridge, a statue, a road or a river \u2013 maybe even a building. Sure we can use a pseudonym if you want. Here\u2019s your chance to get something really big named after you. The more people who support this reward tier, the bigger our world will become.

Everything in the $350 reward level with a key enhancement. Your in-game store will become the answer to a puzzle, required by 10000 players. This drives players to become aware of your business. Want all traffic? See our $495 reward....

Everything in the $450 reward level with a key enhancement. Your in-game store will become the answer to a puzzle, required by EVERY player. There are many things that every player must complete in order to progress. Discovering your business within the game will become part of that experience.
QUEST LORD\r\nEverything from the $400 level plus a special in-game rank of Quest Lord and our recognition as a Global Development Partner. You will be rewarded for finding new players and sponsors.

Everything from the $400 reward and an extremely rare Quest Shaper known as \u201cWild View\u201d, which will enable you to see up to 7 Quest Shapers without opening them, making this extremely potent when it comes to making trades in Merchantopia.

Wow this has to be good, so here goes\u2026  Everything in the $600 level plus we will have one of our professional artists transform a photo of you into digital art placed into the game. Imagine walking into the Guild of Merchants and seeing your face hanging on the wall. Now we think that\u2019s a pretty cool idea.

Everything from the $1,000 reward plus we will ask Vlado Hudec to design a piece of music and name this after you. This will be used within the game and we will provide you with a digital copy, along with all other tracks Vlado creates exclusively for us.

Everything from the $1,000 reward plus a suite of puzzles designed around you. This works especially well for people with business because it helps drive awareness about your company or perhaps a good cause.

Everything from the $2500 level and something extra special\u2026 We will also add your name to one of the seven Quest Kingdoms meaning that one day you could find your head and name on a Qetoo silver coin \u2013 yeah, a real life silver coin with your head on it!

Everything in the $3,000 level plus a senior role in either the Guild of Merchants or the Guild of Thieves (you decide). Both have their merits, you just have to decide where your morals lie. So not only do we build your likeness into the game and give you a ton of goodies we actually give you a role within the game, which has its own unique rewards.
